verses.esv: 5 Build houses and live in them; plant gardens and eat their produce.
verses.kjv: 5 Build ye houses, and dwell in them; and plant gardens, and eat the fruit of them;
verses.niv: 5 "Build houses and settle down; plant gardens and eat what they produce.

verses.esv: 6 I planted, Apollos watered, but God gave the growth.
verses.kjv: 6 I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.
verses.niv: 6 I planted the seed, Apollos watered it, but God made it grow.
